thread.title: Metals: Gold Rises on Weaker Dollar

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Metals: Gold Rises on Weaker Dollar
text:
Gold prices rose Wednesday, lifted by a weaker dollar.
Gold for February delivery closed up 0.3% at $1,339 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index was recently down 0.1% at 83.20. A weaker dollar tends to boost gold, which is denominated in the U.S. currency and becomes more...
